about.title: About Me
about.description: Hey! I'm Arka, a programmer who loves open-source and tinkering with Linux. I'm all about the command line, customizing systems, and getting into the nitty-gritty details. I enjoy making tech efficient, flexible, and accessible.

items.name: DevOps & Linux Server Management
items.description: Expert in configuring and maintaining Linux servers with emphasis on security hardening, performance optimization, and infrastructure automation.

items.name: Automation via Shell Scripting
items.description: Strong command of Bash and POSIX shell scripting for creating efficient automation workflows, system management tools, and deployment processes.

items.name: Docker Orchestration
items.description: Experienced in containerizing applications, managing multi-container environments, and implementing efficient orchestration strategies.

items.name: Build Systems & CI/CD
items.description: Intermediate experience in setting up and maintaining build pipelines using tools like Make, CMake, and Jenkins.

items.name: React & Next.js
